title: Ping problems (Help me, so tilted)
body: So up till three days ago I've been having major ping problems out of nowhere, I use to have a steady 73 ping per game, now it's gone up to 800 per game and not going down. I've submitted a request to riot (still waiting for a response), downloaded a software that prioritizes league when it's running, and restarted my internet multiple times (I've literally sat underneath my router to play). Please help me :(.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=GarbageGorilla,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=s5fii7MP,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-07-11T06:17:06.675+0000)
>
> yes

Try a hardwired connection and see if you get the same results when it comes to wifi it is hard to find the cause of it because wifi is never a for sure thing when it comes to MS because of the variables involving wifi such as traffic on the signal you are using ect. do you have a duel wifi router with the 2.4ghz/5ghz signal?
2.4 its like shitty century link wifi

There are a number of factors that cause Latency (ping) to change. The most common is an ISP making changes in how they route traffic to the requested server. Since you've already opened up a ticket with our tech specialists, I recommend you continue working with the specialist to get this resolved.

Let me know if you have any questions.
